document.full_text: two yemenis died and hundreds were hurt on sunday when police used live rounds, tear gas and batons to try to break up protests against president ali abdullah saleh, who called for an end to weeks of unrest.
document.title: two protesters die, hundreds hurt in yemen clash
lines_and_colors: two yemenis died and hundreds were hurt on sunday when police used live rounds, tear gas and batons to try to break up protests against president ali abdullah saleh, who called for an end to weeks of unrest.
